root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 15-2-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: All data submitted by countries to FRA, including the FAO estimates made in case of desk studies, are available at the FRA on-line platform (http://fra-platform.herokuapp.com). The platform also includes the sub-indicators for 15.2.1. A request for validation was sent to the respective Head of Forestry before finalization and publishing of data.
